bicep.path.value: <this will be set by a pipeline task>

bicep.supported.value: <this will set by a pipeline task>

bicep.version.value: <this will be set by a pipeline task>

mainTemplate.deployment.filename.value: <this will be set by a pipeline task> (the actual JSON file being deployed - currently this is always the same as mainTemplate.filename.json)

mainTemplate.filename.json.value: <this will be set by a pipeline task> (which JSON file is found, either azuredeploy.json or mainTemplate.json)

prereq.resourceGroup.name.value: <this will set by a pipeline task>

prereq.template.fullpath.value: <this will be set by a pipeline task>

resourceGroup.name.value: <this will set by a pipeline task>

sample.folder.value: <this will set by a pipeline task>

inputs.script:
$ttkUri = "$(ttk.uri)"
write-host $ENV:BUILD_REPOSITORY_ID
write-host $ENV:SYSTEM_PULLREQUEST_PULLREQUESTNUMBER

# Look for use-staging-scripts label
$labelUri = "https://api.github.com/repos/$ENV:BUILD_REPOSITORY_ID/issues/$ENV:SYSTEM_PULLREQUEST_PULLREQUESTNUMBER/labels"
Write-Host "Looking for label at $labelUri"
$labelResult = curl -s $labelUri
Write-Host $labelResult
if ($labelResult -like '*"name": "use-staging-scripts"*') {
    Write-Host "... Found"
    $ttkUri = "https://azurequickstartsservice.blob.core.windows.net/ttk/staging/arm-template-toolkit.zip"
    Write-Host "Using script location $ttkUri"
} else {
    Write-Host "... not found"
}

New-Item '$(ttk.folder)' -ItemType Directory
Write-Host "ttkUri: $ttkUri"
Invoke-WebRequest -uri $ttkUri -OutFile "$(ttk.folder)/$(ttk.asset.filename)" -Verbose
Get-ChildItem '$(ttk.folder)' -Recurse

Write-Host "Expanding files..."
Expand-Archive -Path '$(ttk.folder)/*.zip' -DestinationPath '$(ttk.folder)' -Verbose

Write-Host "Expanded files found:"
Get-ChildItem '$(ttk.folder)' -Recurse

$AzModuleUri = "$(az.module.uri)"

gci env:

 $p = ($env:psmodulepath).split(';')[0]

Invoke-WebRequest -uri "$AzModuleUri" -OutFile "$env:TEMP/az.zip" -Verbose

#Get-ChildItem '$p' -Recurse

Write-Host "Expanding files..."
Expand-Archive -Path "$env:TEMP/az.zip" -DestinationPath "$p" -Verbose

Write-Host "Expanded files found:"
#Get-ChildItem "$p" -Recurse

Get-Module Az -ListAvailable

steps.displayName: Connect To Azure (Admin) To Create RGs

inputs.script:
# If Bicep, build and verify compiled JSON matches included JSON.
$(ttk.folder)\ci-scripts\Validate-DeploymentFile.ps1

$GitHubRepository = $ENV:BUILD_REPOSITORY_NAME
$GitHubPRNumber = $ENV:SYSTEM_PULLREQUEST_PULLREQUESTNUMBER
$HasDocOwner = $(($ENV:DOCOWNER_MESSAGE).Length -gt 0)
Write-Host "##vso[task.setvariable variable=HasDocOwner]$HasDocOwner"

$PRUri = "https://api.github.com/repos/$($GitHubRepository)/pulls/$($GitHubPRNumber)"

$response = Invoke-Restmethod "$PRUri"

if($response.title -like "*MOVE:*" -and $HasDocOwner){
    Write-Host "##vso[task.setvariable variable=pingTom]YES"
}

inputs.comment: @mumian - this appears to be a "Move" that will need a manual doc update

steps.displayName: Ping TomFitz re: moving a sample used in docs copy

inputs.comment: @tfitzmac - this appears to be a "Move" that will need a manual doc update

steps.condition: and(succeeded(), eq(variables['deploy.prereqs'], 'true'), ne(variables['prereq.resourceGroup.name'], variables['resourceGroup.name']),  ne(variables['result.deployment'], 'Not Supported'), ne(variables['validation.type'], 'Manual'))

steps.displayName: DEBUG: dump mainTemplate param file content (prereqs)
DEBUG: dump mainTemplate param file content
Connect To Azure (Admin) To Clean Up

inputs.script:
<#

This is a placeholder - for when we want to write the last test result to the readme file

#>

# remove the resource group
Write-Host "First attempt..."
& $(ttk.folder)/ci-scripts/Kill-AzResourceGroup.ps1 -ResourceGroupName "$(resourceGroup.name)" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

# if the resource group still exists after the first attempt, try again after a few minutes
Write-Host "Checking for ResourceGroup…"
if ((Get-AzResourceGroup -Name "$(resourceGroup.name)" -verbose -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) -ne $null) {

    Write-Host "Found the resource group - sleeping..." 
    Sleep 600
    Write-Host "Attempting Kill-AzResourceGroup…"
    & $(ttk.folder)/ci-scripts/Kill-AzResourceGroup.ps1 -ResourceGroupName "$(resourceGroup.name)"

}

# remove the resource group
Write-Host "First attempt..."
& $(ttk.folder)/ci-scripts/Kill-AzResourceGroup.ps1 -ResourceGroupName "$(prereq.resourceGroup.name)" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

# if the resource group still exists after the first attempt, try again after a few minutes
Write-Host "Checking for ResourceGroup…"
if ((Get-AzResourceGroup -Name "$(prereq.resourceGroup.name)" -verbose -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) -ne $null) {

    Write-Host "Found the resource group - sleeping..." 
    Sleep 600
    Write-Host "Attempting Kill-AzResourceGroup…"
    & $(ttk.folder)/ci-scripts/Kill-AzResourceGroup.ps1 -ResourceGroupName "$(prereq.resourceGroup.name)"
}
